mapper.select: SELECT a.rid, a.rqOjCt ,replace(a.rqOj_OjSeqno,'|','enterpoint') rqOj_OjSeqno ,replace(a.rqOj_BldSeqno,'|','enterpoint') rqOj_BldSeqno ,replace(a.rqOj_OjSign,'|','enterpoint') rqOj_OjSign ,replace(a.rqOj_OjTp,'|','enterpoint') rqOj_OjTp ,replace(a.rqOj_Rnk,'|','enterpoint') rqOj_Rnk ,replace(a.rqOj_Dt_Mtt,'|','enterpoint') rqOj_Dt_Mtt ,replace(a.rqOj_Dt_AccptPlc,'|','enterpoint') rqOj_Dt_AccptPlc ,replace(a.rqOj_AccptPlcFlgcd,'|','enterpoint') rqOj_AccptPlcFlgcd ,replace(a.rqOj_FldstObjFlgcd,'|','enterpoint') rqOj_FldstObjFlgcd ,replace(a.rqOj_UndgAccptYn,'|','enterpoint') rqOj_UndgAccptYn ,replace(a.rstOj_OjTpEqalYn,'|','enterpoint') rstOj_OjTpEqalYn ,replace(a.rstOj_RnkEqalYn,'|','enterpoint') rstOj_RnkEqalYn ,replace(a.rstOj_Dt_MttEqalYn,'|','enterpoint') rstOj_Dt_MttEqalYn ,replace(a.rstOj_Dt_AccptPlcEqalYn,'|','enterpoint') rstOj_Dt_AccptPlcEqalYn ,replace(a.rstOj_AccptPlcFlgcdEqalYn,'|','enterpoint') rstOj_AccptPlcFlgcdEqalYn ,replace(a.rstOj_FldstObjFlgcdEqalYn,'|','enterpoint') rstOj_FldstObjFlgcdEqalYn ,replace(a.rstOj_UndgAccptYnEqalYn,'|','enterpoint') rstOj_UndgAccptYnEqalYn ,replace(a.rstOj_EtMtt,'|','enterpoint') rstOj_EtMtt FROM ls_suitability_12 a ORDER BY a.rid
